body.text: This is my new website! It's being created using a CMS for vue.js that I'm developing. Currently in beta, as not everything works and looks perfect yet. Future plans for this CMS include live editing of pages and open sourcing it.
All my latest projects will be found here, as editing pages and creating new content for this is way easier than on the last website. I plan to migrate everything from the old site here eventually.

contents.title: Guelph Course Scheduler
contents.text: Popular application for creating course schedules at the University of Guelph. Used by over 2000 students every semester.

contents.title: Dungeon Map Generation with Locks and Keys
contents.text: Generator for raids in my upcoming Minecraft MMORPG World Seed Online

contents.title: C++ Lighting Engine
contents.text: 2D Lighting engine written in C++. Uses ray casting and layering to create realistic lighting effects

contents.title: Monte Carlo Tree
contents.text: Design to approximate the NP complete scheduling problem

contents.title: Scala Import Sorter
contents.text: Popular Scala library to sort imports. Contributed substantial amounts of code.

contents.title: Ultimate Thinkpad T420
contents.text: Writeup of how I created the ultimate open-source laptop

contents.title: Vue-CMS
contents.text: CMS designed with Vue.js. The CMS this website was made with!

contents.title: T420 Battery Design
contents.text: Open source battery for the Thinkpad T420

contents.title: T420 Battery Design Part 2
contents.text: Open source battery for the Thinkpad T420 Part 2

contents.title: Reverse Engineering with GDB and Linux
contents.text: Introduction to using tools on Linux such as strings and GDB to reverse engineer, patch and exploit x86 executables.
